title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, January 10, 2022
description: It's the birthday of Stephen Ambrose, who said of why he chose to become a historian “[It] occurred to me that I could add to the sum of the world's knowledge."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Stephen Ambrose, who said of why he chose to become a historian “[It] occurred to me that I could add to the sum of the world's knowledge."
